price: 49. Ils dirent : « Ô toi le magicien ! Implore donc pour nous ton Seigneur, en vertu de l’engagement qu’Il a pris envers toi, et nous trouverons certes le droit chemin ! »
arabic: وَقَالُواْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَ ٱلسَّاحِرُ ٱدۡعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ بِمَا عَهِدَ عِندَكَ إِنَّنَا لَمُهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waqālū yāayyuha al-sāḥiru ud'ʿu lanā rabbaka bimā ʿahida ʿindaka innanā lamuh'tadūna
